data.title: Weil am Rhein climate: Weather Weil am Rhein & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Weil am Rhein

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Weil am Rhein

>>average temperature by month Weil am Rhein

>>Weather Weil am Rhein

In Weil am Rhein, the climatic conditions are categorized as mild and moderate. The city of Weil am Rhein experiences a significant amount of rainfall, even during the month with historically low precipitation levels. As per the Köppen-Geiger classification, the prevailing weather conditions in this region are categorized under Cfb. The mean yearly temperature observed in Weil am Rhein is recorded to be 10.5 °C | 50.8 °F. Precipitation here is about 1274 mm | 50.2 inch per year.

Weil am Rhein is in the northern hemisphere. -> It is situated in the upper half of the planet. Summer begins in September and ends at the end of June. The months of summer are: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Weil am Rhein

During February, the amount of precipitation is at its lowest, with only 77 mm | 3.0 inch recorded. The majority of rainfall occurs during the month with the highest precipitation, which is May, and has an average amount of 135 mm | 5.3 inch.

average temperature by month Weil am Rhein

The month of maximum warmth in a year is July. The average temperature during this period reaches up to 19.9 °C | 67.9 °F, making it the hottest time of the year. During the month of January, the mean temperature registers at a minimum value of 1.4 °C | 34.6 °F. This represents the coldest monthly average throughout the entire year.

Weather by month // weather averages Weil am Rhein

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The variation in precipitation between the months with the lowest and highest levels of rainfall is 58 mm | 2 inch, as observed. Throughout the year, there is a fluctuation in average temperatures by 18.5 °C | 33.3 °F.

The month of highest relative humidity is November (84.95 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is July (67.70 %). The month which sees the most rainfall is May (11.90 days). The driest month of the year is February (16.77 days).

Airport close to Weil am Rhein

The closest Airports of Weil am Rhein are: Baden Airport (FKB) 136.89km,Friedrichshafen Airport (FDH) 143.47km,Stuttgart Airport (STR) 169.39km

You can reach Weil am Rhein from this Cities by Plane: London (STN), Athens (ATH), Copenhagen (CPH), Vienna (VIE), Paris (CDG), Birmingham (BHX), Hamburg (HAM), Cologne (CGN), Bremen (BRE), Alicante (ALC), Málaga (AGP), Faro (FAO), Funchal (FNC), Porto (OPO), Ankara (ESB), Bilbao (BIO), Frankfurt am Main (FRA), Santa Cruz de Tenerife (TFS), Rijeka (RJK), Las Palmas de Gran Canaria (LPA)
